name: woocommerce
tagline: A self-hosted e-commerce platform for WordPress
description: WooCommerce is the leading e-commerce plugin for WordPress, enabling self-hosted online stores with products, payments, shipping, and extensions. It powers small shops and large catalogs, and integrates with many third-party services.

features.title: Product Management
features.description: Create and organize physical, digital, and variable products with detailed attributes

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Accept payments through Stripe, PayPal, and dozens of other integrated processors

features.title: Shipping Options
features.description: Configure shipping zones, rates, and methods including real-time carrier calculations

features.title: Inventory Tracking
features.description: Monitor stock levels, set low-stock alerts, and manage backorders automatically

features.title: Tax Calculation
features.description: Automate tax rates based on customer location with support for complex tax rules

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Process orders, generate invoices, and track fulfillment from a centralized dashboard

features.title: Customer Accounts
features.description: Allow customers to create accounts, view order history, and save payment methods

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Create discount codes with flexible rules for percentages, fixed amounts, or free shipping
